name: df-addr
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(cplusr, cmpo(s0, s1, universe, universe, cmpt(s2, cr, co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s2)), caddc, cfv(cv(s1), cv(s2))))))

comment: Define the operation of vector addition. (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 27-Jan-2012.)
